actions.name: Aroma Veil
actions.description: Effect: The user and allies within range of the user recover from Minor Status Afflictions at twice the normal rate, removing 2 stacks at the end of the Activation instead of 1.

system.description: Effect: The user and allies within range of the user recover from Minor Status Afflictions at twice the normal rate, removing 2 stacks at the end of the Activation instead of 1.
